articles.title: Powder Your Prints For Baby-Smoothness - Hackaday
articles.description: Layer lines are a dead giveaway to non-normies that a thing was 3D printed. There are things you can do to smooth them — sanding, chemical smoothing, and fillers come to mind. Although this t…
